question: What is the name of the writer whose pen name is "K.P. Kojo"?
explanation: Nii Ayikwei Parkes born in the United Kingdom to parents from Ghana, where he was raised, is a performance poet, writer, publisher and socio-cultural commentator. He is one of 39 writers aged under 40 from sub-Saharan Africa who in April 2014 were named as part of the Hay Festival's prestigious Africa39 project. He writes for children under the name K.P. Kojo.
